post:
**fileMEDIA:** We are a german host founded 2008 which specializes in vps hosting. Our own infrastrucutre and hardware provide high performance and stability which is located in Jena, Germany. If you have any question, please use our support ticket or live chat!

Do you need special setups, high availability VMs or storage deployments with GlusterFS. No problem, we can help you!

Information, go to: [https://filemedia.de](https://www.filemedia.de)

**General features:**

- SolusVM
- Automatic rDNS for IPv4/6
- Hardware Raid10
- 1 Gbit/s VPS connecion
- additional HDD/SSD disks
- Cheap additonal traffic packs
- Only ECC RAM and enterprise disks
- Free DNS
- Free trial server for 7 days

**Location: Jena, Germany**
Test IPv4: 84.23.64.44
Test IPv6: 2a02:180:b:1::bf5e:a3ba
Speedfile: http://lg.filemedia.net/100MB.test
Looking Glass: http://lg.filemedia.net/

_PowerBox Micro_
256MB DDR3 ECC RAM
15GB Hardware RAID10 HDD
1x vCPU @ E3-1230v2/1270v2 or E5-2620
1x dedicated IPv4 Address

1TB Bandwidth @ 1 GBit/s
Linux-KVM with SolusVM
€2.97 per month with promotion code "lowendbox2013"
